text: Melum, allah iru manitarkalaip parriya (marrum) or utaranam kurukiran; avviruvaril oruvan umai(yana atimai) entap porulin mitu (urimaiyum) caktiyum arravan; tan ejamananukkup perum cumaiyakavum avan irukkinran; enku avanai anuppinalum avan yatoru nanmaiyum kontu vara mattan; marravano, tanum ner valiyiliruntu, (piraraiyum nanmai ceyyumaru) nitiyaik kontu evukiran - ivanukku (muntiyavan) camamavana
